00031 public class NamedDB {
00032 
00033         private volatile Object[][] data;
00034         private volatile int index,  writersWaiting,  readers;
00035 
00040         public NamedDB() {
00041                 this.data = new Object[1][2];
00042                 this.index = this.writersWaiting = this.readers = 0;
00043         }
00044 
00045         synchronized public void getReadLock() {
00046                 while ((writersWaiting != 0)) {
00047                         try {
00048                                 wait();
00049                         } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
00050                         }
00051                 }
00052                 readers++;
00053         }
00054 
00055         synchronized public void releaseReadLock() {
00056                 readers--;
00057                 notifyAll();
00058         }
00059 
00060         synchronized public void getWriteLock() {
00061                 writersWaiting++;
00062                 while (readers != 0 && writersWaiting != 1) {
00063                         try {
00064                                 wait();
00065                         } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
00066                         }
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 
00070         synchronized public void releaseWriteLock() {
00071                 writersWaiting--;
00072                 notifyAll();
00073         }
00074 
00081         public int idx(Object key) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00082                 for (int i = 0; i < index; i++) {
00083                         if (key.equals(data[i][0])) {
00084                                 return i;
00085                         }
00086                 }
00087                 throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException("Can't locate key for index");
00088         }
00089 
00095         public void kill(Object key) {
00096 
00097                 int i, j, k, l;
00098                 Object[][] olddata;
00099                 int didsomething = 0;
00100 
00101                 try {
00102                         k = idx(key);
00103                 } catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException b) {
00104                         return;
00105                 }
00106                 olddata = new Object[index + 2][2];
00107                 // copy to olddata, skipping 'k'
00108                 for (i = 0, l = 0; l < index; i++, l++) {
00109                         if (i == k) {
00110                                 l++;
00111                                 didsomething++;
00112                         }
00113                         for (j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
00114                                 olddata[i][j] = data[l][j];
00115                         }
00116                 }
00117                 index -= didsomething;
00118                 data = olddata;
00119         }
00120 
00127         public void add(Object key, Object val) {
00128                 Object[][] olddata;
00129                 int i, j;
00130                 i = 0;
00131                 kill(key);
00132 
00133                 olddata = new Object[index + 2][2];
00134                 // copy to olddata
00135                 for (i = 0; i < index; i++) {
00136                         for (j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
00137                                 olddata[i][j] = data[i][j];
00138                         }
00139                 }
00140                 data = olddata;
00141                 data[index++] = new Object[]{key, val};
00142         }
00143 
00151         public Object get(Object key) throws RuntimeException {
00152                 for (int i = 0; i < index; i++) {
00153                         if (key.equals(data[i][0])) {
00154                                 return data[i][1];
00155                         }
00156                 }
00157                 throw new RuntimeException("Key not found");
00158         }
00159 
00166         public boolean exists(Object key) {
00167                 for (int i = 0; i < index; i++) {
00168                         if (key.equals(data[i][0])) {
00169                                 return true;
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172                 return false;
00173 
00174         }
00175 
00182         public Object getnext(int i) throws RuntimeException {
00183                 if (i < index && i > -1) {
00184                         return data[i][1];
00185                 }
00186                 throw new RuntimeException("No more data");
00187         }
00188 
00192         public int getcount() {
00193                 return index;
00194         }
